CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName ~= "DEAD" then self:hitDong(TriggerBodyEntity, 350) for key, value in pairs(_UserService.UserEntities) do value.ScoreComponent.score = value.ScoreComponent.score - 0 end self:deleteDong() end
